descriptionSet.description: On this page from a brochure advertising the Hindi movie "Patanga" from 1971, some basic information is given concerning the movie and its crew. In the center, an image of a dancing couple with several musicians in the background in a hallway can be seen.

inscription.text: Shashi Kapoor - Vimi - Ajit - Sajjan Wasti - Ashok Kapoor - Laxmi Chhaya - Zeb Rehman - Jagdish Raj - Rammohan - Leela Mishra - Pravin Paul - Geeta - Ameena Bai - Ram Awtar - Shekhar Purchit - Ürem - Shiv Chander - Ravinder Kumar - Haroon - Lal - Nasir - Balaram - Santosj - Rajkumar & Rajindernath

Directed by Kedar Kapoor Music Shanker Jaikishan Screenplay & Dialogue Pt. Mukhram Sharma Produced by Kedar Kapoor & R.S. Sharma Story Vinod Kumar Director of Photography Rajendra Malone W.I.C.A. K.R. Films, 109 Famous Cine Building, Mahalaxmi Bombay - 11.
World Rights Controlled by Naresh Tradng Co. Bombay-2.

description-en: On this page from a brochure advertising the Hindi movie "Patanga" from 1971, some basic information is given concerning the movie and its crew. In the center, an image of a dancing couple with several musicians in the background in a hallway can be seen. (gs)

explanatory comments/crosstagging: Story line of the movie: In order to reward Ramu for loyally serving his family for many years, Amar Singh undertakes to treat Ramu's son, Shyam, as his younger brother, ensures that he has a good education in a college in Dehradun, and even made plans with Manoharlal to send him abroad for further studies. When Manoharlal unexpectedly passes away, he permits the later's wife, Kanta and her son, Pappu; an elderly aunt and her son, Kuldeep; and unmarried sister, Renu, to move in with him in his mansion. He falls in love with Renu and plans to marry her much to the chagrin of Thakur Chandan Singh, who had planned to get his sister, Rajkumari, married to him, and was offended when Amar suggested that she be married to Shyam instead. Before he could handle this animosity, he and Ramu will have to deal with an unexpected situation that will involve a courtesan named Champa. http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0232288/ (gs)
related hyperlinks: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0232288/, last accessed 2012-01-16, story plot, leading actors (gs)
